page.title: 17St.Davids Assemblies.
page.content: St.Davids Assemblies is one of the major employers of labour in the St.Davids area.The factory employs 130 people ,100 ladies and 30 men.They make thermostats for kettles and heaters.There is a parent factory in Buxton and 4 or 5 other components in the group.The parent factory produces, designs and sells the products and sends components down to the factory in St.Davids,Montgomery,Inverness and Ashwood Dale.Then the finished products get sent back to Buxton to be sold in Great Britain. Some are exported to Japan,Singapore and Hongkong.It is owned by shareholders.
